about_the_game:
Embark on the ultimate monster-catching adventure in Hentaimon Prologue! Discover a vast and unexplored world filled with unique monster girls, each waiting to be discovered. Unravel the hidden mysteries within forgotten lands and form special bonds with your companions. With engaging gameplay mechanics, special interactions, and a cast of captivating characters, Hentaimon Prologue is your gateway to an unforgettable journey where friendship and strategy meet. Are you ready to capture, train, and battle alongside your allies and unveil the world’s secrets together?

Your adventure awaits – a world of wonder and intrigue is just waiting to be discovered.

  • 15 Maps: Explore the world of Hentaimon Prologue, with lots of biomes and secrets hidden throughout the world

  • More than 25 Rewards: In Hentaimon Prologue we have lots of types of hentai scenes to choose from.

  • More than 20 Monster Girls: Various types of monster girls to please all your desires.

  • Upgrade your skills: By using your skills, you'll upgrade them and become stronger as you progress through the game.

  • Quest System: You have lots of quests to find and complete. From the main quest to personal quests with the Hentaimons.

  • Battle System: Fight your foes and make they get naked to you.

  • Build your team: Choose 5 of your favorite Hentaimon to join your adventure and help you save the world.

  • Become more than friends: Increase your affinity with your Hentaimons to gain gifts, special quests, evolve and special scenes.

  • Story Rich: This world is just waiting to tell it's story.

  • All characters in the game are over 18 years old

Explore the world to encounter all different types of Hentaimon! Each one of them have their own abillities, traits, interests, personal quest and much more.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Explicit Mature Content.
All the hentai scenes in the game are uncensored and consensual.
Contains sex with humans, monsters and masturbation.
All characters are over 18 years old.

name: Hentaimon Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Hentaimon is a old-school classic monster-catcher with a special lewd twist. Bond with Hentaimon and explore a broad world filled with thrilling turn-based battles, a mysterious threat awaiting defeat, and lots and lots of hentai. It's time for you to explore the wonder world of these monster girls!
